question: What is Ebiwoni
answer: Ebiwoni is a platform connecting service seekers with skilled workers and professionals in Nigeria. Whether you need a service or want to offer your skills, Ebiwoni is here to help.

question: How do I sign up as a service seeker
answer: Signing up as a service seeker is easy! Visit our website, click on the "Register" button, and follow the simple registration steps. You can also call our support team for assistance.

question: How can I find a service provider on Ebiwoni
answer: To find a service provider, simply search for the specific service you need using our search bar. Browse through the profiles of available workers and choose the one that suits your requirements.

question: Can I trust the service providers on Ebiwoni
answer: Yes, Ebiwoni takes user safety seriously. We verify service providers and encourage users to leave reviews. You can also view a provider's profile and ratings before making a decision.

question: How do I sign up as a service provider
answer: If you're a skilled worker looking to offer your services, sign up as a service provider by visiting our website and selecting "Become a Worker." Fill out your profile, set your rates, and start receiving job requests.

question: How do I set my rates as a service provider
answer: When signing up as a service provider, you'll have the option to set your minimum rate and day rate for services. You can also negotiate rates for specific jobs outside the platform.

question: How does payment work on Ebiwoni
answer: Service seekers can pay service providers directly through the platform. Ebiwoni collects a commission based on the minimum rate set by the provider or the budget specified by the user.

question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service provided
answer: if you're not satisfied with the service, please contact our support team. We'll investigate the issue and work to resolve it in a fair and timely manner.

question: Is Ebiwoni available outside Nigeria
answer: Currently, Ebiwoni primarily serves users and workers in Nigeria. We plan to expand to other regions in the future.

question: How can I contact Ebiwoni's support team
answer: ou can reach our support team by emailing support@ebiwoni.com or calling +2349066511281. We're here to assist you with any questions or concerns.

question: Can I become a service provider and a service seeker on Ebiwoni
answer: Yes, you can! Ebiwoni allows users to have both service seeker and service provider profiles, giving you the flexibility to access a wide range of services.

question: What happens if a service provider cancels a job request
answer: If a service provider cancels a job request, you will be notified, and the funds you paid will be refunded to your Ebiwoni account.
